thread.title: BIG DISGRACE!! Light Goes Off At Senate Building As Ambassadorial Nominees Are Being Screened
thread.title_full: BIG DISGRACE!! Light Goes Off At Senate Building As Ambassadorial Nominees Are Being Screened

author: Jo Daniel
title: BIG DISGRACE!! Light Goes Off At Senate Building As Ambassadorial Nominees Are Being Screened
text:
Jo Daniel February 8, 2017 
Power failure at Room 324, Senate New Building marred the screening of the non-career ambassadorial nominees for whom President Muhammadu Buhari is seeking legislative approval. 
The light went off at exactly 12:13 pm. The Senate Committee on Foreign Affairs, which is conducting the exercise for the 46 nominees, had to continue with the screening in darkness when light failed to come on. Recommended for you
